welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Altamonte Springs! Known for its charming atmosphere and beautiful parks, we invite you to discover all that our city has to offer and make unforgettable memories during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial and private flights at Orlando Executive Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orlando Sanford International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Terminal A is primarily used for domestic flights operated by Allegiant Air.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B is primarily used for international flights operated by TUI Airways and Icelandair.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kissimmee Gateway Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Kissimmee Gateway Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orlando International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Terminal A at Orlando International Airport serves domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B at Orlando International Airport serves international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leesburg Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Leesburg Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.
